TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted - and thanks to Mr. Nietzsche, that means you are dead.

I wish it wasn't nice out when I'm working, and rainy when I'm off.

Edited May 10, 2014 by HeadHunter67

Granted. Now it's thunderstorms all time.

I wish I had less serious colleagues.

Granted. No one gets their work done now.

I wish I had a life outside of video games.

Granted. But it's only ONE life, you can't collect more, you don't have continues, you can't save scum, you have to eat, drink, take pee and poo, breath and there's basically infinite ways to die, therefore losing your only life and having a definitive game-over. Seems bad? It's not, because IRL you can have

(insert your word for mating here)

that more than pays for the risks. And, well, the sunrises ans sunsets are beautiful, the rain pouring down outside is refreshing, there's fragrances in basically everything and, well, there's smiles. Smiles are awesome. Get your *** outside and go get some smiles for you and for the ppl you like, dude.

I wish a wish.

Granted. Your wish was of the perspective of Bilbo Baggins. Sauron rules in fire and tyranny because Bilbo Baggins was magically sent home by Wishmaking Fairy and got caught by the Black Riders later.

I wish that the hypothetical observer of human existence transferred memory from earlier-born to older-born, also violating time and the lightspeed law.

(Don't just say, HURR DUR 'CUS IT HYPOTHETICAL)

Edited May 11, 2014 by Tery215

Granted, but HURR DUR 'CUS IT HYPOTHETICAL

I wish for a chao from the Sonic Adventure games.

Granted. He is programmed to destroy his new master and return to Sonic at all costs.

I wish What If, XKCD, converted to videos and would contain content accumulated over 500 years.

Edited May 11, 2014 by Tery215

Granted. You will never be able to watch it all.

(I'm glad I'm not the only one who reads those)

I wish everyone lived in Ghana.

Granted. The skin color variety is severely handicapped as a result.

I wish there were more pumpkin conspiracies.

Granted. The skin color variety is severely handicapped as a result.

I wish there were more pumpkin conspiracies.

Granted! However, one of the conspiracies turn out to be true, and it's that you are actually a pumpkin. Everybody get's really hungry and feasts on you.

I wish that that I had skating abilities and couldn't die. The whole world is just as glitchy as Skate 3 as well.

Granted. You are locked into prison until death (forever) because you killed several dozens of people due to physics bugs.

I want squad to add even bigger parts than Kerbodyne.

Granted. They also add a budget. Also, every bigger part costs math.huge (/ infinity)

I wish that Space Engine combined with Seed of Andromeda, KSP, and Minecraft, plus a minigame which simulates the universe.

Granted. They also add a budget. Also, every bigger part costs math.huge (/ infinity)

I wish that Space Engine combined with Seed of Andromeda, KSP, and Minecraft, plus a minigame which simulates the universe.

Granted! However, the Deep Space Kraken has now mutated into a god-like AI deity that slaughters your Kerbals/Minecraft players/pilots, and destroys everything in its path.

I wish Scott Manley would engage in a KSP ship battle, all-stock.

Granted, but since Scott Manley always "Flies Safe", no one is actually damaged in the battle.

I wish that more KSP players could differentiate between science and alleged "magic".

Granted, everything is magic now. All scientist-like players are charged with heresy and burned.

I wish that people stop making grammar mistakes, so that grammar nazis are without ammo.

Granted. The rules of grammar e-changesj while nazise grammaress first up it-pick soon please.

I wish for a notepad ++.

Granted but it is only for the future Windows 17 which doe isn't come out until you die.

I wish to be chosen as a volunteer for Mars One.

Granted. It crashes, because it is an incredibly bad idea in that kind of timescale.

I wish that mechjeb could dock.

Granted, Sadly it becomes rogue and kills everyone

I wish i had an self-refilling potato chips bag

Granted. You become so fat you can't even leave your own bed.

I wish i lived on Venus, and were immune to all it's effects, and be able to eat sulfur and drink acid rain and breathe the atmosphere.

granted, But the sun starts to grow in form and consumes Mercury and Venus during its growth.

I wish i had a choco-chip ice cream taco

Granted, but someone eats it.

I wish for [REDACTED]

Granted, but she leaves you for your brother and takes her monkey dressed as a clown with her.

I wish there were more hours in the day.

Granted. Night was removed, so you can't sleep.

I wish there was more hours of night.

Granted, welcome to Venus.

I wish more people used Firefox
